MASEventService.Name: AddAccountEvents
MASEventService.Description: The AddAccountEvents element contains methods necessary to the creation of an account

EventMethod.Name: StartAddAccount
EventMethod.Description: Method to begin the process of adding an account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: StartAddAccountWithTemplate
EventMethod.Description: Method to begin the process of adding an account using a template

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: TemplateEffectiveDate
Parameter.Description: Parameter identifying the timeframe during which the template is effective

Parameter.Name: TemplateAccount
Parameter.Description: Parameter provides a template for account creation

EventMethod.Name: StartAddAccountOfType
EventMethod.Description: Method to begin the process of adding an account with a defined type

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SelectedAccountType
Parameter.Description: Parameter to define selected account type

EventMethod.Name: SelectAccountType
EventMethod.Description: The AddAccount method allows clients to add new accounts to the MetraNet system

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: AddAccount
EventMethod.Description: The AddAccount method allows clients to add new accounts to the MetraNet system

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: Account
Parameter.Description: Parameter specifying an account to be added

Parameter.Name: NewAccountId
Parameter.Description: The output of this method is a generated account id

Parameter.Name: SendEmail
Parameter.Description: Boolean variable communicating whether or not to send an email to the new account

Parameter.Name: ApplyAccountTemplates
Parameter.Description: Method checks this parameter and applies a template if true

EventMethod.Name: CancelAddAccount
EventMethod.Description: Method aborts the creation of a new account if called

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: GeneratePassword
EventMethod.Description: Method to generate a password for the new account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: Password
Parameter.Description: Output parameter defined as the generated password
